patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,7 +1,7 @@
 /* Custom CKEditor styles */
 .cke_editable {
-    background-color: #f0f0f0;  /* Light gray background */
+    background-color: #982d2d;  /* Light gray background */
     color: #333;  /* Dark text */
     font-family: Arial, sans-serif;  /* Font family */
     font-size: 16px;  /* Font size */
 }

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -2,6 +2,6 @@
 .cke_editable {
     background-color: #982d2d;  /* Light gray background */
     color: #333;  /* Dark text */
     font-family: Arial, sans-serif;  /* Font family */
-    font-size: 16px;  /* Font size */
+    font-size: 160px;  /* Font size */
 }

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,7 +1,7 @@
 /* Custom CKEditor styles */
 .cke_editable {
     background-color: #982d2d;  /* Light gray background */
-    color: #333;  /* Dark text */
+    color: #bd1010;  /* Dark text */
     font-family: Arial, sans-serif;  /* Font family */
-    font-size: 160px;  /* Font size */
+    font-size: 16px;  /* Font size */
 }

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,7 +1,5 @@
-/* Custom CKEditor styles */
-.cke_editable {
-    background-color: #982d2d;  /* Light gray background */
-    color: #bd1010;  /* Dark text */
-    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;  /* Font family */
-    font-size: 16px;  /* Font size */
+/* Force background change */
+body, .cke_contents {
+    background-color: #f0f0f0 !important;  /* Use your desired color */
+    color: #333333 !important;  /* Optional: Change text color too */
 }

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,5 +1,7 @@
-/* Force background change */
-body, .cke_contents {
-    background-color: #f0f0f0 !important;  /* Use your desired color */
-    color: #333333 !important;  /* Optional: Change text color too */
+/* Custom CKEditor styles */
+.cke_editable {
+    background-color: #982d2d !important;  /* Light gray background */
+    color: #bd1010 !important;  /* Dark text */
+    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;  /* Font family */
+    font-size: 16px;  /* Font size */
 }
